title: Fergie Interview and More
itunes:title: Fergie Interview and More
description:
Monday 9/11 Today on the show we had Fergie come by for the first time, where she spoke about her new album, working with hip hop artist and even rapped for us. Moreover, Charlamagne also gave “Donkey of the Day” to Adrien Broner for knocking out a guy over the weekend. Also, we had listeners call up for “Shoot Your Shot” and this time a girl was trying to redeem herself for a second chance at love from a guy she beat up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 9/11 Today on the show we had Fergie come by for the first time, where she spoke about her new album, working with hip hop artist and even rapped for us. Moreover, Charlamagne also gave “Donkey of the Day” to Adrien Broner for knocking out a guy over the weekend. Also, we had listeners call up for “Shoot Your Shot” and this time a girl was trying to redeem herself for a second chance at love from a guy she beat up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
